introduction.paragraph: This request deletes a single session.

body.paragraph: This request does not have any required headers.
This request does not use query parameters.
This request does not use a message body.

unordered-list.list-item: 404 Not Found – Specified session not found

body.paragraph: This response uses only standard HTTP headers.
If the session is successfully deleted, the response has an empty message body. If the session is not deleted, the message body contains error information.
The following example deletes a session with session ID 06ee06ff24ec585b860616076e412d33797f04cf in database named cookbook.
body.code-block: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Length: 98 Content-Type: application/json Date: Thu, 06 Nov 2014 00:14:25 GMT Server: Couchbase Sync Gateway/1.2.0
body.paragraph: The following example shows the response returned when you attempt to delete a session that does not exist on the server.
body.code-block:
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found Content-Length: 40 Content-Type: application/json Date: Thu, 06 Nov 2014 00:30:09 GMT Server: Couchbase Sync Gateway/1.2.0
{ "error": "not_found", "reason": "missing" }
